title: Security and Compliance Center docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center, you can embed security checks into your every day workflows to help monitor for security and compliance.

section_recommended.title: What is a collector?
section_recommended.description: To start monitoring your compliance posture, you must first gather your configuration data by using a collector.

section_recommended.title: What is a rule?
section_recommended.description: A rule is used to define the guardrails for how resources can be configured in your account.

section_recommended.title: Viewing your current posture
section_recommended.description: Learn more about your compliance score and how it is calculated.

tiles.title: Now available: Longer default storage
tiles.description: The data that is generated during a scan is now stored for 180 days.

tiles.title: Change to permission requiremnts for integrations
tiles.description: IAM roles for managing integrations have been updated.

tiles.title: Deprecated: Credential passphrase
tiles.description: The ability to manage the security of your credentials using a passphrase will no longer be supported as of 1 September 2022.
